Successful administrative login and comm.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log for connections using network management protocols (SSH, Telnet, SNMP) to network devices. Correlate with successful administrative logins (Windows Event ID 4624) on network management servers. Analyze login times, source IPs, and connection duration using descriptive statistics (e.g., frequency, time series) to identify unusual management access patterns or lengthy sessions.

Changes detected in network device syste.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for unusual traffic patterns (e.g., unexpected changes in traffic volume, shifts in protocol usage) or potential performance degradation on network links using statistical process control or time series anomaly detection focused on network segments involving critical devices.
